name: @nnniyaz/label-run
description: Run shell commands sequentially with prefixed, colorized output
author: Niyaz Nassyrov

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
